name: Oxygen
headline: A leading digital bank in the US offering personal and businessâ¦
generated_description:
Oxygen is a digital banking company that’s carving out a niche in the U.S. financial landscape by offering innovative solutions aimed at both individuals and businesses. Founded in 2018 in San Francisco, it became part of Y Combinator’s Summer 2018 batch, a solid validation of its potential. With a growing team of 68 employees, Oxygen is playing in the fintech and neobank arena, which is no small feat.

Their mission centers around redefining personal and business banking with an emphasis on accessibility and affordability. They provide a suite of services including medical discount plans via a platform dubbed Vativis, which targets the health insurance space by aiming to reduce out-of-pocket costs for users. This offering empowers both employers and individuals by providing alternatives to traditional health insurance, which is becoming increasingly burdensome.

For those looking to explore what Oxygen offers, they have built a comprehensive digital experience that includes personal plans, business plans, and tailored solutions for brokers. Their website, [Get Oxygen](http://getoxygen.com), is user-friendly and designed to streamline access to a wealth of health-related benefits. These include telehealth services, mental health support, primary care, and even options for managing hospital bills—all aimed at providing a full spectrum of care.

Oxygen understands the pressures businesses face regarding rising health benefit costs—expecting nearly a 6% increase per employee by 2025. Their approach is simple yet powerful: give users the ability to select plans that fit their specific needs, providing what they describe as "transparency" in the health benefits space. 

So, whether you are an individual looking for affordable healthcare options or a business seeking cost-effective employee benefits, Oxygen is tailoring its services to meet the demands of today’s market. In an age where financial and healthcare services are increasingly overlapping, Oxygen stands out as a forward-thinking company poised to make a real impact.
